citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 16:15-16:45
on 14-NOV-17.
No authorized person was available to conduct the inspection. Phone call to the owner was not answered.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.

on 14-NOV-17.
No authorized person was available to conduct the inspection.  Phone call to the owner was not answered.
